EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Having trouble viewing this email? View in Web Browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]>.
<[[http://www.martell.com/en-ww/]]>
Thank you for signing up
We look forward to creating epic mixes with you at Hyde at 53M on Thursday the 18th May at 9 p.m. Don’t be late :)
53, Jalan SS 21/1a, Damansara Utama, 47400 Petaling Jaya, Selangor <[[https://goo.gl/maps/KX1TaQwHAi32]]>
<[[https://www.facebook.com/martell.my]]>
